A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (1) The importance of Luke and Leia to fans who grew up with Star Wars clearly means nothing to Rian Johnson.  Leia was my hero\, she was the only heroine of her kind in the 80s.  Rian Johnson completely made her useless.  BIG F you to that. (2) Luke goes against his nephew\, even though he was willing to sacrifice himself for the evil of the galaxy - Darth Vader\, but...what was that with Ben Solo?  (3) Bombs drop in space?  Uh...do you have any science knowledge\, Mr. Johnson? (4) What's the point of Canto Byte when all one person had to do was share the plan?  (5) And\, finally\, Rey is NOBODY?  She can beat Kylo with no training at all\, and she's related to nobody?
